itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NHL play by play broadcaster Dan D'uva of the Las Vegas Golden Knights as he talks about the Golden Knights improbable run to the Stanley Cup Finals as well as his life and career.  

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It"

https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/0692096663
